tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE employees (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_name VARCHAR(255),
    department VARCHAR(255),
    manager_id INT,
    hire_date DATE,
    performance_rating DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE performance_metrics (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    productivity_score INT,
    error_rate DECIMAL,
    feedback TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY(employee_id) REFERENCES employees(employee_id)
);

CREATE TABLE evaluations (
    evaluation_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    evaluator VARCHAR(50),
    evaluation_date DATE,
    performance_review TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY(employee_id) REFERENCES employees(employee_id)
);

CREATE TABLE performance_metrics (
    metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    metric_name VARCHAR(50),
    value DECIMAL,
    date_measured DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES employees(employee_id)
);

CREATE TABLE remote_evaluation (
    evaluation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    evaluation_date DATE,
    feedback TEXT,
    rating DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES employees(employee_id)
);

CREATE TABLE performance_metrics (
    metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    metric_name VARCHAR(255),
    metric_value FLOAT,
    evaluation_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES employee_data(employee_id)
);

CREATE TABLE remote_work_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    log_date DATE,
    start_time TIME,
    end_time TIME,
    hours_worked FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES employee_data(employee_id)
);

CREATE TABLE evaluations (
    evaluation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    evaluator_id INT,
    evaluation_date DATE,
    performance_score FLOAT,
    feedback TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES employee_data(employee_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (evaluator_id) REFERENCES employee_data(employee_id)
);
